Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the nickname "sea fiend." It slurps up poison to nourish itself.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Overqwil’s poisonous spikes will reflexively react even while Overqwil sleeps, stabbing any moving thing that approaches.
Generation IX.Violet: It’s ferocious and has a short temper. The ends of its spikes are barbed, and they can’t be easily removed once they’ve punctured something.

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Crimson Mirelands : Lake Valor (only one during Mission 15) Cobalt Coastlands : Massive Mass Outbreaks

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Evolve Hisuian Qwilfish Tera Raid Battles ( 6★ )
